text:
@realDonaldTrump COVID-19 doesn't care if you try to wish it away. It's a virus - a cluster of proteins and DNA with no consciousness that spreads through the air and lives for days on any surface.

You are desperate, I get it. But ending this lockdown early will be the end of your presidency.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
